archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.9f: f) reinforcing good security behaviours with acknowledgements (e.g. recognition in internal communications, payment of a commensurate financial reward or positive reflections in annual appraisals).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
